text: bhūmiyehi movun saṁcāraya kara, movunṭa vaḍā itāmat śaktivantayin vaśayen siṭi movunṭa pera siṭiyavungē avasānaya kesē vūyēda yanna dækkē nædda? (pera siṭiya aya kopamaṇadō śaktivantayin vaśayen siṭiyada, allāhgē dan̆ḍuvamen bērīmaṭa nohæki viya. mandayat) ahashi hō bhūmiyehi hō æti kisivak allāhva parājaya kirīmaṭa nohæka. niyata vaśayenma allāh (siyalla) hon̆din danneku hā itāmat balasampannayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
